title: American Genius Series - Season 1
description:
Description
American Genius Series - Season 1 - Episodes 1 thru 8

 
http://static.newepisodes.me/posters/62795.jpg

S1, Ep1
1 Jun. 2015
Jobs vs. Gates
Bill Gates vs. Steve Jobs.

Wright Brothers vs. Curtiss
S1, Ep2
1 Jun. 2015
Wright Brothers vs. Curtiss
The struggle for performance and technology in the budding aviation industry. Between the Wright Brothers and the Glenn Curtiss.

Hearst vs. Pulitzer
S1, Ep3
8 Jun. 2015
Hearst vs. Pulitzer
Covers the struggle between William Hearst and his idol Joseph Pulitzer for control of the publishing industry at the turn of the 18th century.

Colt vs. Wesson
S1, Ep4
Jun. 2015
Colt vs. Wesson
The invention of the perfect revolver pits Samuel Colt and Daniel Wesson in a race for patents that will forever revolutionize the firearm industry.

Farnsworth vs. Sarnoff
S1, Ep5
8 Jun. 2015
Farnsworth vs. Sarnoff
Outlines the lives of two titan's of the telecommunications industry. Farnsworth who's largely responsible for the invention of the television. And Sarnoff who while running RCA laid the ground work for the television networks of the 21st century.

Oppenheimer vs Heisenberg
S1, Ep6
22 Jun. 2015
Oppenheimer vs Heisenberg
A look at two physicists on opposite sides of the race for the first atomic bomb during World War II.

Space Race
S1, Ep7
8 Jun. 2015
Space Race
America and the Soviet Union set out to conquer the moon, but much more than space flight is at stake.

Edison vs Tesla
S1, Ep8
22 Jun. 2015
Edison vs Tesla
The struggle for excellence and performance between the Wright Brothers vs. Glenn Curtiss. 

Xtras
